Detailed Description

An optimization for convolution using FFTs.

Author:
valliappa.lakshmanan

LatLonGrid edu.ou.asgbook.transforms.FFTConvolutionFilter.convolve ( LatLonGrid  data  )  

00027                                                {
00028         Complex[][] in1 = zeropad(data);
00029         int nrows = in1.length;
00030         int ncols = in1[0].length;
00031         Complex[][] in2 = zeropad(coeffs, nrows, ncols );
00032         
00033         // compute their ffts
00034         in1 = fft(in1);
00035         in2 = fft(in2);
00036         
00037         // multiply point by point (this by the conjugate of other)
00038         for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i) for (int j=0; j < ncols; ++j){
00039             in1[i][j] = in1[i][j].multiply(in2[i][j].conjugate());
00040         }
00041         // take ifft
00042         Complex[][] result = ifft(in1);
00043         
00044         // return real part, rounded off
00045         LatLonGrid out = LatLonGrid.copyOf(data);
00046         for (int i=0; i < out.getNumLat(); ++i) for (int j=0; j < out.getNumLon(); ++j){
00047             out.setValue(i,j, (int)Math.round(result[i][j].real));
00048         }
00049         return out;
00050     }

00057                                                             {
00058         // create output directory
00059         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("fftconv");
00060         
00061         // read input
00062         LatLonGrid popdensity = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA, new GlobalPopulation.LogScaling()).crop(500, 1000, 1024, 2048);
00063         System.out.println("Grid size=" + popdensity.getNumLat() + "x" + popdensity.getNumLon());
00064         KmlWriter.write(popdensity, out, "fullgrid", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00065         double[][] coeffs = ConvolutionFilter.gauss(301, 301);
00066         long timer = System.currentTimeMillis();
00067         LatLonGrid sm = new FFTConvolutionFilter(coeffs).convolve(popdensity);
00068         long ffttime = System.currentTimeMillis() - timer;
00069         KmlWriter.write(sm, out, "fftgauss", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00070         
00071         // do it in spatial domain
00072         timer = System.currentTimeMillis();
00073         LatLonGrid sm2 = new ConvolutionFilter(coeffs).convolve(popdensity);
00074         long spatialtime = System.currentTimeMillis() - timer;
00075         KmlWriter.write(sm2, out, "spgauss", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00076         
00077         double improvement = 100*((double)(spatialtime - ffttime))/spatialtime;
00078         System.out.println("The FFT technique took " + ffttime + "ms whereas the spatial technique took " + spatialtime + " ms. FFT is " + improvement + "% faster");
00079     }
